channel.title: Moparscape.. A Mean Community?
channel.description:
I see a lot of new players coming here and thinking that we have a mean community. Actually I thought this at first too. But now, after being here for quite a while, I see why that we come across as rude sometimes; Because you make us angry by doing things that I posted below.
I used to post bull shit tutorials like adding weapon specials too your server.. LOL. I used to be the biggest troll of all time :D I tried too hard to be accepted
The Moparscape Community will only be rude too you if:
- You ask the most Stupid Questions; Eg: "h0w can i ad ::pure an ::mastre into meh servere?" http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470864.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470680.0.html
- You post the most stupid shit in the wrong section; Eg: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470723.0.html
- You're a newcomer, and you come here acting cool & big, and start too troll;
- You post bull-shit tutorials that no one needs and that are completely based off of common sense; Eg: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470162.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470159.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470163.0.html
- Your just straight up annoying and you don't speak proper English, No one can understand you; Eg: [quote="sonsofgod2, post:3, topic:368498"]Hey smart guy stop commenting on my post. with no answer. ur just spamming.[/quote]
And other reasons
As long as you don't do the things above, there is a 99.7% chance you will get accepted on moparscape
AGREE? DON'T AGREE? DISSCUSS;

item.title: Moparscape.. A Mean Community?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:27, topic:374927”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=470896.msg3443999#msg3443999 date=1293272762]
it’s the internet, just live with it!
[/quote][/quote]
Compared to other sites were nice, mumbles “Stupid fucken lame post” mumbles. Just look at others, we have websites just to make fun of people. Also to all people who say Google is raciest, it learns from what we type it so a hell of a lot of people must have been Googling “Black people stole my car” Just saying…

Read full topic

@Reapers1 wrote:

Hahahahahah. I laughed at the how to make staff on your server, its fucking simple. No need to make some dumb tuts. He thinks that moparscapians are idiot.

item.title: Moparscape.. A Mean Community?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:33, topic:374927”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=470896.msg3444855#msg3444855 date=1293348176]
Moparscape… Nice?

Somewhat, mainly just a place for five types of people

Trolls | Newbies | Community Members | Arrogant Experienced Programmers | Moderators

I’d say MoparScape is more of a training ground for people who do become Moderators to actually show a community they can be responsible.
[/quote]

I don’t think that’s fair to put everybody into groups.

I do think moparscape has improved from what it was years ago, though you cannot expect a perfect community.[/quote]

It’s only generalizing what you normally see around here.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape.. A Mean Community?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=470896.msg3443725#msg3443725 date=1293248026]

[quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=470896.msg3443721#msg3443721 date=1293247606]
Woah calm down people, its the internet, were all fucken mean haha
[/quote]and we are all 6’1, rich, buff, etc. Right?
[/quote]'specially silab.

On a serious note; how can you create a topic about the comunity as a whole being mean, when only certain people flame for stupidity. I see no meaning behind this thread as it’s a biased opinion. Hell yeah many people flame others, but a lot of the people in this community are kind, and the rest are immature faggots who can’t stand to treat someone with respect.

You cannot say MoparScape is mean, when you don’t know the nature of the whole community.

/thread[/quote]

…? I wasn’t saying Mopar is a mean community, I was directing this too all the new players who THINK Mopar is a mean community

I <3 MOPAR

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

ziplock:

We’re not mean, we just don’t like people without common sense, and twelve year olds.

Thank goodness im 13! :D!

But even then it is hard to keep your cool because the stuff that 60% of people have needed help with is extremely basic stuff.

Cane, that was exactly what im trying to say, but i failed with my example with the trolls lol, ok, better example:

Topic:
How do i edit Item stats?
Delta
Reply:
In item.cfg
Oposter:
Were is that?

Inb4 go find it?
